MENUS AND DISPLAYS Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 Chart – Data Entry Window Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

SELECTIONS:

Search Parameter The search parameter combo box allows the user to select the criteria for the airport search from the following parameters:

• ICAO (default selection)

• Airport name

• City

• State

• Country.

5th Edition 5-232 02 APR 19
